snippet: Bode Miller, known as unpredictable on and off the slopes, has been uncharacteristically cautious about returning to the World Cup circuit.
abstract: Bode Miller, known as unpredictable on and off the slopes, has been uncharacteristically cautious about returning to the World Cup skiing circuit; is recuperating from a knee injury, but some wonder if his prolonged absence can be attributed to recent changes in his personal life.
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller, known as unpredictable on and off the slopes, has been uncharacteristically cautious about returning to the World Cup circuit.

headline.seo: Miller Still Absent From Tour After Knee Surgery
headline.main: Tour Waits for Miller and Wonders as He Waits to Heal
headline.print_headline: Tour Waits for Miller and Wonders as He Waits to Heal
